Tool

NameChange Cell Values
ID13
AuthorVictor Olaya (c) 2004
Specificationgrid, interactive

Description

The module allows one to interactively change cell values of the input grid. Once the module is executed and running, you can use the Action tool to select grid cells. While working on a grid, you can change (and apply) the 'New Value' and the 'Method' parameters without stopping and re-starting the module.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Grid Grid (input)GRIDThe grid to modify.
Options
ValueFloating pointVALUEThe value to apply.Default: 0.000000
MethodChoiceMETHODChoose how to apply the new value.Available Choices: [0] set [1] add [2] subtract Default: 0
RadiusFloating pointRADIUSChange all values within radius.Minimum: 0.000000 Default: 0.000000
